property.name: Subtype

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keldon warriors don't need signals to tell them when to attack, but when to stop.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Carl Critchlow

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target land and all other lands with the same name as that land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Land charred black, rivers boiled, Crops and wells alike despoiled, Mountains leveled, forests felled - Footprints of the beasts of Keld.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Todd Lockwood

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Goat Beast

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You'll never get a Keldon's goat.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Marc Fishman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Phyrexian killing machines couldn't have known the seriousness of their mistake in wounding the ape - they'd never seen it angry.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Paolo Parente

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a black card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A fruit must rot before its seed can sprout. - Yavimaya saying

property.name: Artist
property.value: Douglas Shuler

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a masterful quilter, Yavimaya stitches together patches of color to warn its denizens of threats.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Greg Hildebrandt + Tim Hildebrandt

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Elf Shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From Gaea grew the world, and the world was silent. From Gaea grew the world's elves, and the world was silent no more. - Elvish teaching

property.name: Artist
property.value: Scott M. Fischer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you control no other creatures, sacrifice Emperor Crocodile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The king of Yavimaya's waters pays constant attention to his subjects . . . and thrives on their adulation.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Kev Walker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Gamekeeper dies, you may exile it. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Scott Hampton

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The balance of nature dictates that one day humans will be stepped on by bugs.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Elf Druid

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {G}. {2}, Sacrifice Heart Warden: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In Llanowar, we tend the forest's boughs and branches. In Yavimaya, we are a part of them." - Rofellos of Llanowar

property.value: Adam Rex

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Bird Beast

property.name: Rules
property.value: Echo {2}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Hunting Moa enters the battlefield or dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.value: Elf Wizard

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Marker Beetles dies, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {2}, Sacrifice Marker Beetles: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In case of emergency, crush bug.

property.value: Carl Critchlow

property.value: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 2 life for each enchantment destroyed this way.

property.value: "This is my place of power. Nothing can take root here unless I allow it." - Multani, maro-sorcerer

property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most spiders wait patiently for their prey to arrive. Most spiders aren't forty feet tall.

property.value: Ron Spencer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two target lands on top of their owners' libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To renew the land, plow the land. To destroy the land, do nothing. - Druids' saying

property.name: Flavor

property.value: Scott M. Fischer

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rain from this storm leaves you pinned to the ground like an insect.

property.value: "At this rate I fully expect to be replaced by a clockwork golem by year's end." - Barrin

property.value: Dan Frazier

property.value: Patrick Ho

property.value: As long as Storage Matrix is untapped, each player chooses artifact, creature, or land during their untap step. That player can untap only permanents of the chosen type this step.
